wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant General Sir Hubert Alan John Reay, KBE, FRCP, CStJ  (19 March 1925 – 4 February 2012) was a senior British Army officer. He served as Director General Army Medical Services between 1981 and 1984.

response: * Lt-Gen Sir Alan Reay (1925–2012), Director General Army Medical Services (1981–1984)
* Lieutenant General Sir Alan Reay, KBE, FRCP, CStJ (1925–2012) a senior British Army officer, Director General Army Medical Services 1981–1984.
*Sir Alan Reay, 86, British Army officer, Director General Army Medical Services (1981–1984).
